name: Davidoff - Classic Series - No. 2
additionalNotes: Handcrafted in the Dominican Republic, Davidoff cigars are high in price and high in quality. Each one looks stunning and burns like a dream. Seamless wrappers, perfect burn, easy draw, relentless consistency, balanced flavor....time and again. Rolled by a select few and blended to perfection, all Davidoff cigars feature 4 year aged, hand-selected Dominican fillers. The Classic Series utilizes a flawless Ecuadorian Connecticut wrapper and a series of small-ring sizes to create a balanced,Â yet highly enjoyable experience that's refined and delicate.
